title: Date and walnut cake with coconut topping
ingredients: ['250ml boiling water', '145g dates, pitted and chopped', '50g butter, softened', '200g caster sugar', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '200g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '60g chopped walnuts', '75g desiccated coconut', '150g dark brown soft sugar', '90g butter', '4 tablespoons cream']
